description: Trucker hats can be fun, stylish, and practical, but did you know they can also be eco-conscious? The go far. feel good.™ Summit Trucker Hat’s brim is created with Bureo NetPlus™ material, which is 100% recycled fishing nets—it’s helping reduce ocean waste while it sits on your head! This hat is made for comfort, with a mesh backing for breathability and an adjustable snap back closure, and it’s got outdoorsy style: it sports an iconic mountain image with the reminder to go far and feel good out there.
name: GFFG Trucker Hat

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool 47% Lyocell - Exclusive of Decoration
